name: TI_2_1_2_1_Security_Event_Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.1 Security Event Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track Security event.
purpose: Capture security events, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when security events are detected according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.1#08
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for the event initiating audit trigger.
